refnamediv.refpurpose: Print the saved values of MIDI controllers.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Print the saved values of MIDI controllers from an array to the console or a file.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Sfile -- File name to receive the values. If omitted it writes to the console.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kcont -- the array of controls as saved by ctrlsave.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the ctrlprint opcode. It uses the file ctrls.csd.
Example of the ctrlprint opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
